Job Description: Job Description       8 to 10 years of strong experience in designing and developing user interfaces using Angular(7/8/9/10)   Strong proficiency with JavaScript TypeScript   Strong understanding of :   o frontend technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3   o key UI/UX design principles   o REST APIs.   o TDD (Test Driven Development) practices and automated UI testing practices and software is required   Knowledge of the MEAN Stack, especially deep knowledge of Angular, Git, Docker etc.     Requirements    Qualifications : B.Tech/B.E. or PG M.S. / M-Tech in Computer Science   Experience Required : 8 to 10 years   Job Location : Pune/Noida
